Uses of Package
game_engine

  • Packages that use game_engine 
    Package Description
    game
    The game created using the game engine, usually kept seperate from the game engine but here it's in the same head package.
    game_engine
    Main game engine package with the GameLoop etc.
  • Classes in game_engine used by game 
    Class and Description
    AbstractGame
    An abstract version of any game created using this game engine.
    GameLoop
    Handles running the game, with a fixed framerate.
    Render
    Handles all type of rendering on the screen.
  • Classes in game_engine used by game_engine 
    Class and Description
    AbstractGame
    An abstract version of any game created using this game engine.
    GameLoop
    Handles running the game, with a fixed framerate.
    Input
    Handles all input mouse and keyboard.
    Render
    Handles all type of rendering on the screen.
    Window
    Handles the players screen.
